text:
Wolfgang Schüssel (born June 7, 1945) was the Chancellor of Austria from February 4, 2000 until January 11, 2007. From January 2006 until June 2006 he was the president of the European Union.
Other websites.
[https://www.parlament.gv.at/WWER/PAD_01781/index.shtml Official page about Dr. Schüssel, at the site of the Austrian parliament (in German)]
